00022 #include "chipstream/DTFactory.h"
00023 #include "chipstream/ChipStreamDataTransform.h"
00024 #include "chipstream/QuantMethodTransform.h"
00025 #include "chipstream/PmAdjustTransform.h"
00026 
00027 using namespace std;
00028 
00029 DataTransform *DTFactory::dataTransformForString(const std::string &spec, 
00030                                                  PsBoard &board) {
00031 
00032   if (m_CSFactory.canBuild(spec)) {
00033     //  stage.spec is something like 'quant-norm.sketch=0'
00034     ChipStream *trans = m_CSFactory.chipStreamForStringBoard(board, spec, "");
00035     
00036     // Wrap the chipstream object as a data transform stage
00037     ChipStreamDataTransform *csStage = new ChipStreamDataTransform(trans);
00038     return csStage;
00039   }
00040   else if (m_QMFactory.canBuild(spec)) {
00041     QuantMethod *qMethod = m_QMFactory.quantMethodForString(spec, board);
00042     QuantMethodTransform *qTrans = new QuantMethodTransform(qMethod);
00043     return qTrans;
00044   }
00045   else if (m_PmAdjFactory.canBuild(spec)) {
00046     PmAdjuster *pmAdj = m_PmAdjFactory.pmAdjusterForString(spec, board);
00047     PmAdjusterTransform *pmAdjTrans = new PmAdjusterTransform(pmAdj);
00048     return pmAdjTrans;
00049   }
00050   else {
00051     Err::errAbort("DTFactory::dataTransformForString() - Don't know how to build specification: " + spec);
00052   }
00053   return NULL;
00054 }
